source.246fecee:
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = [16, 8]

A = imread('../input/tpsymultimidias/lena.png')
im = np.array(A)
Red = im[:, :, 0]
Green = im[:, :, 1]
Blue = im[:, :, 2]

img = plt.imshow(A)
img.set_cmap('gray')
plt.axis('off')
plt.show()
source.64f8bfe3:
def compression (M,k):
  U, S, VT = np.linalg.svd(X,full_matrices=False)
  S = np.diag(S)
  Mreseltat = U[:,:k] @ S[0:k,:k] @ VT[:k,:]
  return Mreseltat
source.0848ed51:
j = 0
for k in range (10,150,10):
    compression(X,k)
    plt.figure(j+1)
    j += 1
    img = plt.imshow(Mreseltat)
    img.set_cmap('gray')
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.title('k = ' + str(k))
    plt.show()
